籤詩版本二:
Imipayini eshinyeneyo nemisipres iyachuma, yaye imvula, ikhephu, umoya neqabaka zizinto eziyimfuneko.
Ikamva liya kuba yinto enkulu ngokukhawuleza, kwaye udumo luya kuba yintsika.
詩意:
Le hexagram ngumfanekiso wehlathi elishinyeneyo lepayini kunye nemisipres.
Kukho ubuhandiba kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Ithamsanqa endleleni. Inkonzo encomekayo ubomi bonke. I-silkworm yasendle ivuthiwe. Intsapho iyaphumelela.
籤詩故事一:
◇UFan Wenzheng wagqiba ekubeni akhe isidudu
UFan Zhongyan, igosa elidumileyo kuBukhosi beNgoma, wayephuma kwintsapho ehlwempuzekileyo eselula.Wayefundela kwimonki ehlala kwiNtaba yaseChangbai.Wayepheka isidudu esineelitha ezimbini zemilili yonke imihla.Emva kokuba siqinile ngobusuku wasisika. Wadla amaqhekeza amane, kusasa nangokuhlwa, watya amaqhekeza amabini, wawadla.
Oku kusetyenziselwa ukuchaza umntu ongoyikiyo ubunzima, ufunda kanzima, kwaye ekugqibeleni ube yitalente yokusetyenziswa kakhulu.
Sika iharrow uzobe isidudu
聖意: UJiazhai uzicingela ngokwakhe, ufuna ubutyebi, uxolo, ishishini, umtshato, impumelelo, uLiujia, abahambi ngeenyawo abangamadoda, amasimi okuthembana, iintshulube zesilika, imfuyo emithandathu, umonakalo, ukulandelela abantu, amatyala, ukufuduka, impahla elahlekileyo, ukugula, ingcwaba le-Anshan, ubuhle.
古人: Umlandeli uWenzheng uthatha isigqibo sokukrazula nokuzoba isidudu
